text: Dolicholatirus lancea is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Vine, P. (1986). Red Sea Invertebrates. Immel Publishing, London. 224 pp. ==External links== * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1791
title: Dolicholatirus lancea
